data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhao, Ping, Pham, Minhlan, Truong, Xuan Lam, Cai, Wanzhi (2014): Flexitibia, a new genus of Harpactorinae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Reduviidae), with a discussion on the functional morphology of fore legs of the related genera. Zootaxa 3795 (5): 564-570, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3795.5.5
